thing-type.label: DSC11 Smart Strip
thing-type.description: Smart Strip<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtAeotec by Aeon Labs Smart Strip is a power board with 6 power points of which 4 can be wireless controlled. Customer can turn on/off their electrics when needed with manually operation or Z‐wave wireless control. Smart Strip has plenty of functions, for example the Over Current Protection and Surge Protection, these functions can efficiently protect people’s various electrics from damage.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap the Action Button.</p&gt <p&gtThe Main (blue) LED will be on steady when successfully included.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap the Action Button.</p&gt <p&gtThe Main (blue) LED will be flashing when successfully excluded.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_2
parameter.label: 1: Voltage to calculate power
parameter.description: Line voltage used for device calculations of wattage

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Selective Reporting
parameter.description: Enable selective reporting only when power changes<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtEnable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic. </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_2
parameter.label: 5: Wattage Threshold - Whole strip
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThreshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Whole HEM). (Valid values 0-60000) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_2
parameter.label: 6: Wattage Threshold - Socket 1
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThreshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 1). (Valid values 0-60000) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_2
parameter.label: 7: Wattage Threshold - Socket 2
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThreshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 2). (Valid values 0-60000) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_2
parameter.label: 8: Wattage Threshold - Socket 3
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThreshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 3). (Valid values 0-60000) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_2
parameter.label: 9: Wattage Threshold - Socket 4
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThreshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 4). (Valid values 0-60000) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_2
parameter.label: 10: Wattage Threshold - Socket 5
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThreshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 5). (Valid values 0-60000) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_2
parameter.label: 11: Wattage Threshold - Socket 6
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThreshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 6). (Valid values 0-60000) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Percent Change - Whole Strip
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtPercentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Whole Smart Strip). (Valid values 0-100) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Percent Change - Socket 1
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtPercentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 1). (Valid values 0-100) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Percent Change - Socket 2
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtPercentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 2). (Valid values 0-100) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: Percent Change - Socket 3
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtPercentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 3). (Valid values 0-100) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.label: 16: Percent Change - Socket 4
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtPercentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 4). (Valid values 0-100) </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_80_4
parameter.label: 80: Status of load changed report
parameter.description: Status of load changed,send group 1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtStatus of load changed,send group 1 associate nodes Hail CC or Basic report CC. </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_90_2
parameter.label: 90: Get Temperature
parameter.description: Get temperature of Smart Strip<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtGet temperature of Smart Strip (Only GET is valid)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_100_1
parameter.label: 100: Reset 0x65~0x67 to default value
parameter.description: Reset 0x65~0x67 to default value

parameter.name: config_101_4_000000FF
parameter.label: 101: select channels to report consumtion as item 1
parameter.description: A binary field for reporting consumption (kWh) of channels<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtChoose the channel or channels to auto-report kWh based on a time interval set in parameter 111. This is the LSB</p&gt <p&gt 1 - report only a summary of all channels ( bit 1)</p&gt <p&gt 2 - report channel 1 wattage (bit 2)</p&gt <p&gt 3 - report a summary of all channels and channel 1 (bits 1 and 2)</p&gt <p&gt 4 - report channel 2 wattage</p&gt <p&gt&lt;...&gt;</p&gt <p&gt14 - channel 3, channel 2, and channel 1</p&gt <p&gt 15 - channel 3, channel 2, channel 1, and summary</p&gt <p&gt etc.</p&gt <p&gt 127 - in the end is reporting values for each individual channel (1-6) and the summary data. In binary, bits 1 through 7 set to 1.</p&gt <p&gt The bit values are as follows:</p&gt <p&gt 1 - summary report</p&gt <p&gt2 - channel 1 report</p&gt <p&gt4 - channel 2 report</p&gt <p&gt8 - channel 3 report</p&gt <p&gt16 - channel 4 report</p&gt <p&gt32 - channel 5 report</p&gt <p&gt64 - channel 6 report</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_101_4_0000FF00
parameter.label: 101: Select channels to report power as item 1
parameter.description: A binary field to choose channels to report power<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtChoose the channel or channels to auto-report wattage based on a time interval set in parameter 111. </p&gt <p&gt<strong&gt examples:</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gt 1 - report only a summary of all channels ( bit 1)</p&gt <p&gt 2 - report channel 1 wattage (bit 2)</p&gt <p&gt 3 - report a summary of all channels and channel 1 (bits 1 and 2)</p&gt <p&gt 4 - report channel 2 wattage</p&gt <p&gt&lt;...&gt;</p&gt <p&gt14 - channel 3, channel 2, and channel 1</p&gt <p&gt 15 - channel 3, channel 2, channel 1, and summary</p&gt <p&gt etc.</p&gt <p&gt 127 - in the end is reporting values for each individual channel (1-6) and the summary data. In binary, bits 1 through 7 set to 1.</p&gt <p&gt The bit values are as follows:</p&gt <p&gt 1 - summary report</p&gt <p&gt2 - channel 1 report</p&gt <p&gt4 - channel 2 report</p&gt <p&gt8 - channel 3 report</p&gt <p&gt16 - channel 4 report</p&gt <p&gt32 - channel 5 report</p&gt <p&gt64 - channel 6 report</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_102_4_000000FF
parameter.label: 102: Item 2 (kWh)
parameter.description: Channel(s) to auto-report kWh<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtChoose the channel or channels to auto-report kWh based on a time interval set in parameter 112. This is the LSB</p&gt <p&gt 1 - report only a summary of all channels ( bit 1)</p&gt <p&gt 2 - report channel 1 wattage (bit 2)</p&gt <p&gt 3 - report a summary of all channels and channel 1 (bits 1 and 2)</p&gt <p&gt 4 - report channel 2 wattage</p&gt <p&gt&lt;...&gt;</p&gt <p&gt14 - channel 3, channel 2, and channel 1</p&gt <p&gt 15 - channel 3, channel 2, channel 1, and summary</p&gt <p&gt etc.</p&gt <p&gt 127 - in the end is reporting values for each individual channel (1-6) and the summary data. In binary, bits 1 through 7 set to 1.</p&gt <p&gt The bit values are as follows:</p&gt <p&gt 1 - summary report</p&gt <p&gt2 - channel 1 report</p&gt <p&gt4 - channel 2 report</p&gt <p&gt8 - channel 3 report</p&gt <p&gt16 - channel 4 report</p&gt <p&gt32 - channel 5 report</p&gt <p&gt64 - channel 6 report</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_102_4_0000FF00
parameter.label: 102: Item 2 (power)
parameter.description: Channel(s) to auto-report wattage<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtChoose the channel or channels to auto-report wattage based on a time interval set in parameter 112. </p&gt <p&gt<strong&gt examples:</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gt 1 - report only a summary of all channels ( bit 1)</p&gt <p&gt 2 - report channel 1 wattage (bit 2)</p&gt <p&gt 3 - report a summary of all channels and channel 1 (bits 1 and 2)</p&gt <p&gt 4 - report channel 2 wattage</p&gt <p&gt&lt;...&gt;</p&gt <p&gt14 - channel 3, channel 2, and channel 1</p&gt <p&gt 15 - channel 3, channel 2, channel 1, and summary</p&gt <p&gt etc.</p&gt <p&gt 127 - in the end is reporting values for each individual channel (1-6) and the summary data. In binary, bits 1 through 7 set to 1.</p&gt <p&gt The bit values are as follows:</p&gt <p&gt 1 - summary report</p&gt <p&gt2 - channel 1 report</p&gt <p&gt4 - channel 2 report</p&gt <p&gt8 - channel 3 report</p&gt <p&gt16 - channel 4 report</p&gt <p&gt32 - channel 5 report</p&gt <p&gt64 - channel 6 report</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_111_4
parameter.label: 111: Interval to send out reports of Group 1

parameter.name: config_112_4
parameter.label: 112: Interval to send out reports of Group 2

parameter.name: config_113_4
parameter.label: 113: Interval to send out reports of Group 3
